name: Block Farmer
description:
Block Farmer is a physics-based idle game where the goal is to amass as many points as possible by pushing blocks into the void! The game was made in 24 hours for the 37th GM48 game jam.

Gameplay

Block Farmer is a very simple game. Use your mouse to push blocks off of the tower and gain points! Use your points in the upgrade shop to make the process faster and more lucrative!
